name: Tomb Raider Restorationist
text: You can Special Summon this card from your hand by sending 1 face-up "Raiding Tool" on the field to the GY. If this card has a "Raiding Tool" Equip Spell card equipped to it: you can add 1 "Raiding Tool" Spell/Trap card from your GY to your hand. You can only use each effect of "Tomb Raider Restorationist" once per turn.
